metadataAttributes.Title: Product Strategy
metadataAttributes.Short Intro: Learn how to build a bullet-proof vision & strategy for any digital product idea. By the end of this course, you’ll know how to identify the right problems to solve, map out business models for capturing revenue, and successfully pitch your strategy to stakeholders.
metadataAttributes.Skills: Product Proposals, Product Management Basics, Problem Validation, Product Validation, Product Requirements Documents, Product KPIs, Stakeholder Management, Storytelling, Mixed Methods Market Research, Competitive Analysis, Total Addressable Market, Return on Investment, Requirements Gathering, Minimal Viable Products, User Personas
